channel.title: Joseph Delaney on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Joseph Delaney on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Hidden disabilities: Joseph Delaney
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan JD - Joseph Delaney MM Ok, now on Iriss.fm on this series of Hidden Disabilities, we are going to be talking to Joseph Delaney. Joseph is on the autistic spectrum and Joseph is going to speak about his ups and downs of his journey. So, thanks Joseph for joining us. The first question, when did you become aware that you might be different? JD Well when I went to mainstream primary school it was discovered I had a moderate learning disability, but even long before that, when I was in nursery school I had a short concentration span so I could only focus on something for a couple of minutes, then I would be away to something else.
